template.name: Template AVM TR-064
template.description: This template requires its corresponding script inside the externalscripts directory, typically /var/lib/zabbix/externalscripts to be executable. It's made for FRITZ!Box and FRITZ!WLAN devices, might work on some other TR-064 compliant devices to some point. Set user, password, and the base address of the FRITZ!Box in the device macros. The "Log" item is disabled due to a never fixed bug in the FRITZ!Box, making its timestamps fuzzy, e.g. differ from time to time Â± 1s. It does not check certificates. Monitoring from outside is technically possible, but unreliable.
